scenario: Home Depot (HD) is a leading home improvement chain with 2,300 stores across the US, Canada, and Mexico. The company has been challenged by the pressured housing market but has seen organic growth opportunities due to home maintenance needs. Sales increased 6.6% year over year in the 2024 fiscal third quarter, but operating margin and net income were down from last year. Home Depot is upgrading its platform and converting to an omnichannel model to meet consumer needs. The company has a strong dividend yield of 2.2% at the current price, well above the S&P 500 average, and has increased more than 280% over the past 10 years.
